actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress in favor of diverting at least one-fifth of the funds which would otherwise be appropriated for foreign military assistance each year and using such funds instead to improve the financial condition of the social security program.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Declares that it is the sense of Congress that at least 20 percent of the funds which would otherwise be appropriated for foreign military assistance be diverted to the Federal Old-Age Insurance Trust Fund and the Federal Disability Insurance Trust Fund.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress in favor of diverting at least one-fifth of the funds which would otherwise be appropriated for foreign military assistance each year and using such funds instead to improve the financial condition of the social security program.
